bibl.title: Legitimacy and Law in the Roman World. Tabulae in Roman Belief and Practice.
bibl.note: See in part. pp. 169-215: Chapter 7. Roman tablets and related forms in the Roman provinces (30 BC-AD 260). Uses the papyrological evidence.
MEYER Elizabeth A., Legitimacy and Law in the Roman World. Tabulae in Roman Belief and Practice.
Cambridge, Cambridge University Press, 2004, 8°, xvi-353 pp., 9 figg. ISBN 0-521-49701-9. £50.
